name: DreamCatcherLife
0:
”Alexa, turn on the kitchen light”
”Alexa, dim the couch light to 30%”
”Alexa, arm my alarm in away mode”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dreamcatcher life
des:
Dreamcatcher Life is a smart home solution for the global residential and SOHO market. Simply link your Dreamcatcher Life account to Alexa within the Alexa mobile app (Skills Type in & search "Dreamcatcher Life" Select "Dreamcatcher Life" Select "Enable") and login to link your Dreamcatcher Life account.

With alarm system, you can arm/disarm/home arm the system, or inquiry the system’s status, say:
"Alexa, arm [my home] in away mode."
"Alexa, arm [my home]."
"Alexa, disarm [my home]."
"Alexa, is [my home] armed?"

With smart lighting, you can turn on/off your light(s), dim or brighten your light(s), and change the color temperature and color of your light(s), say:
"Alexa, turn on [light name]."
"Alexa, turn off [light name]."
"Alexa, turn on the lights."
"Alexa, turn off the lights."
"Alexa, set the [light name] to [1-100] percent."
"Alexa, dim the [light name]."
"Alexa, set the [light name] softer."
"Alexa, make the [light name] warmer."
"Alexa, make the [light name] whiter."
"Alexa, make the [light name] warm white."
"Alexa, set the [light name] to daylight."
"Alexa, set the [light name] to [color]."

With vacuum cleaner, you can turn it on or off, say:
"Alexa, turn on the vacuum."
"Alexa, turn off the vacuum."
